microsoft.hawaii.sdk.OcrService.ServiceContracts

Class OcrText

  • java.lang.Object
    • microsoft.hawaii.sdk.OcrService.ServiceContracts.OcrText

  • public class OcrText
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains one text item that is obtained after a Hawaii OCR call.
